decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ("Site Plan", undated, received 02/07/13; "Block Plan", undated, received 02/07/13; "Side Elevations existing", undated, received 02/07/13; Untitled proposed section, undated, received 01/10/13; "Proposed floor plan" Rev: 1, dated 28 Sept 03, received 01/10/13; "Elevations side" Rev: 1, dated 27 Sept 03, received 01/10/13; and "Elevations Proposed and Existing Front and Rear" Rev: 1, dated 28 Sept 03, received 01/10/13) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Change of roof from flat to pitched on existing ground floor rear extension
